1. Microsoft begins blocking some terms that caused its AI tool to create violent, sexual images  CNBC
  2. Microsoft's Copilot now blocks some prompts that generated violent and sexual images  Engadget
  3. Microsoft AI engineer warns FTC about Copilot Designer safety concerns  The Verge
  4. Censored Microsoft Copilot can still make vulgar images  Windows Central
  5. Microsoft's Copilot Designer makes 'sexual, violent content': AI engineer  New York Post
